title: Business Communication
description: Enhance your French speaking skills with phrases suitable for business communication. Focus on precise pronunciation and professional intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of phrases commonly used in business communication in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a formal and professional speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and the concise expression of business concepts.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.
